webpage.para: SDG group members have free registration, but please do register so we know who will be attending. SDG individual members need to register, but will receive a $50 discount.
Registration is $300 US for corporate and government attendees, $200 for academic users, and $100 for students. (Adjusted as indicated above.)
See the SwarmFest hotels for lodging options. The registration fee does not include lodging.
Alternatively, you may also contact the Swarm Development Group at (505)989-9001.
